captions.text: Welcome to How To Cook That
I am Ann Reardon

Today we are making a hunger games inspired
cake.

For between the layers of the cake I am using
a peach ganache, to make that strain some

peach juice off some tinned peaches and heat
it to a boil. Pour the hot juice over the

white chocolate. Push the chocolate down so
it is all in contact with the juice and leave
to sit for a minute.

Then stir until smooth, if you still have
a few lumps like this then you may need to
microwave it for 10 seconds to melt those.

Set that aside to firm up, if you have got
time leave it overnight at room temperature

on the bench overnight if not if you need
it in a hurry then put it in the fridge.

Now to make our ganache for the outside of
the cake I am using a mixture of dark and

milk chocolate. And using cream like you normally
do. Heat that up and pour it over the top
just like we did for the juice

All of the recipe details that you need to
make this cake including the amount of juice

and chocolate and the cake recipes and the
amount of fondant you need all of that is

detailed on the website howtocookthat.net
there is a link the the description just below
this video.

To make your cakes turn on your oven and grease
and line your tins, you can just make three

cakes to make it the height of the one that
is shown.

You can either use a cake mix or use the sponge
cake recipe that is on the website. Take out

half a cup of mixture and place it into a
clean bowl, and repeat that with another half

a cup of mixture. Colour one orange using
some red and yellow food colour and colour

the other one a deep red.
Pour your cake mixture evenly between your

three tins and then using a spoon put large
dots of coloured batter on the top.

Take a knife and swirl it through the mix,
you don't want to stir it so much that it

blends together we want it to look like swirls
of flame going through the cake.

To check if your cake is ready put a knife
in the centre, if it still has gooey mixture

on put it back in the oven.
If the knife comes out clean then it is done,

run a knife around the outside of the tin
and leave it to cool.

Take your cooled cake and shake the tin up
and down on each side to check that it is

loose. Then tip the cake out and peel the
paper off the base. Because my cake plate

is not completely flat I am going to flip
the cake upside down and put the rounded side
into the concave part of the plate.

So that your cake does not slip add a small
amount of your peach ganache onto the plate
and then add the cake.

Add half of your ganache and spread it over
the cake.

Then use a knife to level off the next layer,
peel the paper off the bottom and place the

cake on top. Take your third cake and level
it and then cut it on a diagonal angle from

the top of one corner right down to the base
on the opposite side. Put the remaining peach

ganache on top of the cake and add your sloped
layer to the top.

Look at you cake from the side and if your
tins are sloped on the edges like these ones

are use a knife to cut off a small layer and
even it out the sides so that they are straight

all the way around.
Next look when you look at your cake check

that the slope on top is completely flat,
if you need to cut a small amount from the

middle cake to smooth it off and make sure
it is perfectly flat.

Using your chocolate ganache spread a thin
layer over the top and all over the sides

of your cake. This only needs to be a thin
layer as I said and don't worry if it has

a few crumbs in it that is the purpose of
this layer is to catch all of those crumbs

from the fresh cake. Put that into the fridge
for about an hour to let that crumb coat firm
up.

While that is is the fridge we need to make
the pin to go on top of the cake and it needs

to be a size that will fit the cake well.
There is a picture of it in the size that

I am using on the website so you can print
it out from there.

Find two bowls or containers in your kitchen
that fit the size of the outer and inner circles

of the pin. Place some non-stick baking paper
over the top, roll out some black fondant

and cut around the bigger bowl and then the
smaller one. Use your smaller bowl to smooth

out and line up your circle with the one that's
on the picture.

Now cut out the mockingjay part of the pin
so that we can use it as a template in a minute,

we still need the other part so don't destroy
it when you are cutting it out. I have read

all of the hunger games books and they are
really well written, but they have quite a

disturbing theme. I think it is interesting
though when you read or watch a movie we tend

to associate with the main characters in the
story. in this case they are poor and struggling

to get enough food to eat. While those in
the capitol are feasting on plenty.

For the arrow roll out some black fondant
to the length of the arrow making it quite

thick. Then cut it with a pizza cutter into
a long strip. Cut an extra triangle and add

it to the top of the arrow head using a little
water and then make and indent on either side

of the centre. Trim the arrow to the right
length then cut an extra piece of black and

fold it in half. Cut it in the middle and
attach it either side of the end. Then repeat

that a little further up the shaft with another
one.

Roll out some more black fondant and place
the mockingjay on top and cut around it with
a knife.

Place this over the top of the circle using
your template to guide you as to where to
put it.

Put the arrow over the template and where
the birds tail is cut out the underneath of

the arrow so that it is thinner and it can
fit over the tail. cut the arrow where it

meets the beak and trim the underneath of
the end of the arrow too.

Slide the baking paper that has the ring on
it over onto the template and put the end

of the arrow in place. Take the top end of
your arrow and thin it out where it crosses

the circle and cut off the beak part then
using a little water attach it put it into
place.

To build up the body of the mockingjay roll
a sphere of fondant and then make it a tear

drop by rolling one side place it onto the
template and make it the right shape and then

transfer it onto the pin.
Rollout a thin snake of black fondant and

run it along the top edge of the wing. Place
a little water on the top wing and put another

snake along that edge tucking it under at
the end. If you look at the picture you will

see there is an indent in that part so take
your knife and push down gently on the snake
so that you have that cut in it there.

Now for the head make a teardrop shape and
then slightly flatten the sides using your

finger and thumb, place it on the template
and shape the top into a point. Then using
a little water put it into place.

Then use a knife to scratch some lines into
the body going from the head around the body.

Then add some more onto the tail and the head.
Look at your picture as you do this so you

know where the lines go. And then put your
knife on a flatter angle and use it to make
indents on the edges of you wings.

Roll another snake and put it down the centre
of the beak, blending it in at the top. Then
use a toothpick make hole for the eyes.

For the feathers on the wing roll some tiny
balls of fondant and make them tear drop shaped
and put them into place.

As I was saying in the story the people in
the capitol have an abundance while those

in the sectors are starving. And while reading
the book or watching the movie we associate

with the poor characters which are the main
characters but in reality if you like me live

in a house a or an apartment if you also have
a car then and some money in the bank then

we are among the top 8% of the worlds wealthy.
Let me introduce you to Lillian.

All across africa there are very many children
who are disadvantaged orphaned and living

in miserable ciurcumstances I was such a child
that was vulnerable. My mother died when I

was three months old and my father was kidnapped
when I was 5 months old and so I was taken

to my step mothers home and I was the one
fetching water from miles and miles serving

the people washing peoples clothes washing
peoples shoes to make me feel like I am useless

. SO I would go to the neighbours to collect
left overs for the pig so I would share with
the pigs.

Lillian had no one and was eating the scraps
that were given to the pigs, and compassion

helped her. They gave her medical care, food
and an education. Our generation has the resources

to end global poverty, I'll put a link under
this video to the compassion website and I

would really like you to consider going there
and donating a chicken or vegetable seeds

or even a goat to a family living in conditions
just like those in the movie . We personally

sponsor a child through compassion and my
kids choose one of these gifts each year to

buy with their own pocket money to give to
someone in need. When you give you don't just

provide food, you also giving hope to these
beautiful people, letting them know they are
not forgotten, that somebody cares.

Back to our capitol like reality, using a
dry paintbrush dust over the fondant with

some gold luster dust. The colour that I am
using is called antique gold and you can buy
luster dust from cake decorating stores.

Take your cake out of the fridge and cover
it over with another layer of ganache. Any

crumbs will be set in the first layer that
you put on which makes it easy to get a nice
smooth finish.

Run your palette knife around the edges and
then smooth off any little bits that are sticking

up by gently swiping into the middle of the
cake.

Take your sugar and water and glucose syrup
or you can use corn syrup into a saucepan

and bring to the boil over high heat, once
the sugar is dissolved wash down the sides

of the pan and leave it unstirred until it
just starts to go slightly golden in one part
of it.

Remove it from the heat and add quickly stir
in some red colour one one side and some yellow

on the other. Immediately pour it out onto
some non-stick baking paper, place another

sheet over the top and spread it out. Do not
touch this with your hands it is extremely

hot and will blister instantly if you get
it on you.

While it is still warm use a knife to indent
where you want it to break so you can get
nice flame shapes.

Once it is completely cooled peel off the
paper and snap it into long pieces, add then

to the side of your cake. Allow the sugar
flames to come up just slightly above the

top of the cake. And start at the front so
you have the best looking pieces there.

Using your palette knife to help you very
carefully lift up the mocking jay pin and
place it onto the cake.

If you have more time you can make these fondant
details ahead and then they will dry out they

only take about three days to dry which makes
it easy to put onto the cake but you can make

it up to a month or two ahead. Add a few smaller
flames to the top around the pin. If you want

this mockingjay pin that you have just seen
me make then I can post this one anywhere

in the world I'll take it off the cake and
set it aside for you. All you have to do if

you want it is just check out the compassion
website give a gift to someone who is in need

and put it in the comments below that you've
done so or if you really cant do that then

at least share the video and give someone
else the opportunity to. You can serve it
just like that.

You can serve it just like that or to make
it more dramatic.
then we can add real flames

To do that take two heat proof pie dishes,
one bigger than the other. Put the smaller

one upside down in the centre of the bigger
one.

Take two pieces of foil and line the edges
up together. Fold the edge over on themselves

at least three times and then open the foil
up flat.

Mold it over the smaller plate being careful
not to put any holes in it. Push it down into

the gap between the bowls to make a valley.
Then wrap it around the base of the larger
bowl so that it looks like this.

Check that there is a gap between your cake
plate and where the flames will be, if you

don't want the sides of your cake to melt
then you will need an even bigger gap. Remember
that this is real fire so it is hot.

Put the cake in the centre and place salt
in the channel that you've made The reason

we use salt is because alcohol burns blue
so it can be hard to see, if we sprinkle some
salt over it the flame becomes red.

Pour some high strength alcohol like vodka
into a jug and warm it slightly, I used 5

seconds in the microwave. If you warm it too
much all the alcohol will evaporate off, if
it is not warm enough it will be hard to light.

Pour the alcohol into the alfoil and light
it up using a brulee torch. The more alcohol

you add the longer it will burn for but the
more it will also melt the sides of the cake
too.

And remember never pour more alcohol from
the bottle onto a flame because the flame

will follow the alcohol up into the bottle
setting it alight and spraying flames around
the room.

Thanks for watching don't forget give someone
hope through compassion and share this video

so others can too. If you are new to how to
cook that hit the subscribe button for all

the latest cakes, chocolates and desserts.
Have great week, I'll see you Friday.
[Music: Hunger Games Tribute by Jon Bruno]

title: Hunger Games Cake Tutorial Mockingjay Cake HOW TO COOK THAT Ann Reardon
